summary: Completed comprehensive backend API testing for Prana Guru spiritual companion app after OpenAI Whisper/TTS integration. All specified voice APIs are working correctly with OpenAI integration.

Festival calendar and panchang data working
GET /api/voice/voices - Returns 5 TTS voices including sage (guru voice)
POST /api/voice/tts - Standard TTS with sage voice working, returns base64 audio
POST /api/voice/tts/hd - HD quality TTS working with tts-1-hd model
POST /api/voice/translate - Text translation using Gemini working (ENâ†’HI tested)
TTS error handling for text over 4096 characters working
POST /api/chat - AI chat integration still working with Gemini
POST /api/astrology/kundali - Kundali generation still working properly
